meanings.definition: A waxy substance found in the blood and cells of the body.
meanings.sent1: High levels of cholesterol can increase the risk of heart disease.
meanings.sent2: Doctors check cholesterol levels to monitor heart health.
meanings.sent3: When cholesterol parties too much in your body, it can cause trouble.
meanings.sent4: Her bloodstream flowed like a river of cholesterol, slow and thick.
meanings.sent5: The doctor described cholesterol as a sticky, waxy troublemaker in the body.

meanings.definition: A type of fat that is necessary for the body to function properly.
meanings.sent1: Cholesterol helps in building cell membranes in the body.
meanings.sent2: Some foods contain good cholesterol that our bodies need.
meanings.sent3: The body's cholesterol squad ensures everything runs smoothly.
meanings.sent4: In the body's orchestra, cholesterol plays a vital role like a conductor.
meanings.sent5: Imagine cholesterol as the essential worker keeping the body machinery well-oiled.
